description: TSPS, services of Evaluation services consultant for the Financial Consumer Agency of Canada (FCAC).
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**

**Tender Title:** 
Evaluating Highly Qualified Contractor Under 2.12 Evaluation Services Consultant for Financial Consumer Agency of Canada
**Tender Reference Number:** PW-22-01011989

**Closing Date:** December 16, 2022

The Financial Consumer Agency of Canada (FCAC) invites contractors who are holders of a Supply Arrangement (SA) under E60ZT-18TSPS/ZT, under Tier 1, to submit proposals for the provision of Evaluation Services Consultant under 2.12. This requirement is subject to trade agreements, including the Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, and the “Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

The expected services will require the evaluation of the CSC’s current role and function to identify opportunities to advance its optimal role to support consumers and contribute to FCAC’s strategic goals. The period of the engagement is expected to be approximately six (6) months, commencing on or about December 20, 2022, and concluding by June 16, 2023.

Requirements and Documents:

- **Estimated Level of Effort:** 120 days
- **Selection Criteria:** To be advised in the subsequent evaluation process
- **Trade Agreements:** The requirement is subject to the following trade agreements:
  - Canada–Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
  - Canada–Colombia Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
  - Canada–Honduras Free Trade Agreement (CHFTA)
  - Canada–Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
  - North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
  - Canada–Panama Free Trade Agreement
  - Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
- **Area of Delivery:** National Capital Region (NCR)

For submitting a proposal, kindly address all inquiries to:
Pavlo Kyryakov
Financial Consumer Agency of Canada
427 Laurier Avenue West, 6th Floor, Ottawa, ON K1R 1B9
Phone: (613) 941-1432
Email: FCAC.Contract-Contrat.ACFC@fcac-acfc.gc.ca

Documentation for this tender can be downloaded from [link](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/31/cf81cfb9b3a3a
